snippet.title: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus - Official Machines of War Update Trailer
snippet.description: Here's your look at Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus' upcoming update, Machines of War, in this latest trailer for the mobile strategy game. The Machines of War update for Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus allows you to use a sixth unit on the battlefield as the machine appears off the hex grid as a station weapon. Machines have two main abilities, a primary which is always active. The secondary can be either an active or passive ability. Machines can be used in the following game modes: Arena, Tournament Arena (but will be available in some tournaments only), Guild Raids, and Guild War. The Machines of War update for Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus will be available in June 2024.
